response.overview: Upon being sent to live with relatives in the countryside due to an illness, an emotionally distant adolescent girl becomes obsessed with an abandoned mansion and infatuated with a girl who lives there - a girl who may or may not be real.
response.tagline: Promise we'll remain a secret, forever.
response.title: When Marnie Was There
